snippet: Nigerian news outlets reported that a truce came amid talks with the militants over the release of more than 200 girls kidnapped from a rural school months ago.
abstract: Nigeria’s top military official declares a cease-fire with Boko Haram, the militant Islamist group that kidnapped more than 200 girls from a rural school months ago; reported cease-fire comes amid talks over the schoolgirls and their possible release.
lead_paragraph: Nigerian news outlets reported that a truce came amid talks with the militants over the release of more than 200 girls kidnapped from a rural school months ago.

headline.main: Nigerian Army Reports Truce With Militants
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Army Reports Truce With Militants
